      • getFamilyName

        public java.lang.String getFamilyName()
        Returns:
        text to appear in "Apply Fix" popup when multiple Quick Fixes exist (in the results of batch code inspection). For example, if the name of the quickfix is "Create template <filename>", the return value of getFamilyName() should be "Create template". If the name of the quickfix does not depend on a specific element, simply return QuickFix.getName().

      • isAvailable

      • startInWriteAction

        public boolean startInWriteAction()
        Description copied from interface: WriteActionAware
        Indicate whether this action should be invoked inside write action.

        Should return false if e.g. modal dialog is shown inside the action. If false is returned the action itself is responsible for starting write action when needed, by calling Application.runWriteAction(Runnable).

        Returns:
        true if the action requires a write action (default), false otherwise.

      • createAddNullableFix

        public static AddAnnotationPsiFix createAddNullableFix(PsiModifierListOwner owner)
        Creates a fix which will add default "Nullable" annotation to the given element.
        Parameters:
        owner - an element to add the annotation
        Returns:
        newly created fix or null if adding nullability annotation is impossible for the specified element.

      • createAddNotNullFix

        public static AddAnnotationPsiFix createAddNotNullFix(PsiModifierListOwner owner)
        Creates a fix which will add default "NotNull" annotation to the given element.
        Parameters:
        owner - an element to add the annotation
        Returns:
        newly created fix or null if adding nullability annotation is impossible for the specified element.
